1.text: Brew banana peel tea to help yourself fall asleep.

2.text: Lay banana peels under a roast to help it tenderize.

3.text: Blend a banana peel into a smoothie.

4.text: Fry or bake the peels to add fiber to a meal.

5.text: Pickle or candy banana peels to preserve them.

7.text: Try rubbing the peels on itchy skin.

8.text: Make a soothing face mask to brighten your skin.

9.text: Apply banana peels directly to acne or blemishes.

10.text: Place banana peels under your eyes to reduce puffiness.

11.text: Create a cheap banana peel fertilizer to add nutrients to your plants.

12.text: Make rich compost for your garden using banana peels.

13.text: Dry the peels and grind them into feed for animals.

14.text: Bury chopped banana peels to deter pests from your plants.
